Locations.Name: Orange Town
Locations.Description: A small town with a few houses and Professor Jon's Lab.

Locations.Name: Professor Jon's Lab
Locations.Description: Professor Jon's famous laboratory, filled with Pals research equipment.

Locations.Name: Route 1
Locations.Description: A grassy path connecting Orange Town and Viridian City. Wild Pals can be found here!

Locations.Name: Viridian City
Locations.Description: A bustling city with a Pals Center and Pal Mart.
